Source Adventurer's Armory 2 pg. 9

Statistics

Cost 60 gp Weight 1 lb.

Damage 1d3 (small), 1d4 (medium); Critical 19-20/x2; Range -; Type P or S; Special monk, see text

Category Light; Proficiency Exotic

Weapon Groups Blades, Light; Monk

Description

This elaborate knife is carved with special barbs and grooves, meant to channel toxins into the bloodstream. Any injury poison delivered with a sanpkhang has its DC increased by 1, or by 2 if delivered as part of a critical hit or sneak attack. The vishkanya'sARG weapon familiarity racial trait grants proficiency with the sanpkhang.
